name: GUT THEM
description:
With no mortals left to prey on, the warmachines move onto the next source of energy: angels.

V.05 is a warmachine without a mission. In the halls of Third Eden, it will decide whether or not to side with the angelic forces fighting for survival. With every decision made remains one desire, lingering in V.05’s code.

GUT THEM.

Created for Mini Jam 119.
